name: Exotic Fruity Match
description:
A game in which you have to closely monitor the fruits and look for options for connecting fruits (three in a row).
Helps your child use time efficiently and develop mindfulness.
The design of the game is bright and colorful.
Train mindfulness by playing the game, adults and children!
------------------------ 
Feel free to rate the game and leave comments.
The game is free, donation is optional, but if you want, I will not mind, thank you very much :)
------------------------
Game controls:
Move cursor: arrow keys
Pause (menu): ENTER
Swap blocks: Z
Speed up blocks: X
Game supports gamepad
------------------------
Special thanks to all the guys who share their assets !!!
Music: *VOiD1 Gaming
Graphics: *IoanaGo
------------------------
